subject: English
title: Chapter 10 Action Words and Phrases
content:
--- Page 1 ---
Listen, read and speak. oS

Teacher :
Form pairs.
Select one word
from each basket at a time
and make meaningful
sentences.
Then present at least ten
sentences.
For example, ‘Run around.’

Teacher :
Form groups of four.
Choose one word

from each tower

and make meaningful
sentences.

Write the words on

big sheets of paper

and show your sentences
to the class.

e a amend wfra savas te Aad.
e guitar are dare wesadd seat Aaa. | |
e gnidta wd After a ait wat (a-z)
weed, aad Aare. fafeat aaa. | |
e gait aret ole eq Wed dee cada
war fefeat sara.

Sgt APTA AeA.
e saita sé, at ae ara aaa.
ale aad. wa ata sara. | |

14) UNIT 1
